Text: Need some words attached to this torrent, relating words that make it easier to find. I tried Silence of the Lambs Collection, Hannibal Lecter Collection... and a few other tries I don't recall, but I had a hard time winding up at this torrent... at any rate, thanks for the up.. this is precisely the collection, or "Pack" as you put it... now, add some drop words that'll link this up with other searches using different words, not just Hannibal Lecter Pack"...
